3i Infrastructure Plc, a private equity firms, has acquired 92% stake in SRL Traffic Systems, a UK-based traffic light manufacturer and hirer, for a consideration of GBP191 million. Both the companies are based in the UK.

The fund from the investemet will be used by SRL Traffic Systems for further growth and expansion.
